Badge Spider Queen Slain

The Badge Spider Queen Slain is an achievement obtained by defeating the Spider Queen boss.

Acquisition

  • Defeat the Spider Queen in combat
  • The badge is automatically awarded upon victory

Significance

  • Marks completion of a significant challenge in the dungeon
  • Part of the collection of badges that document the hero's accomplishments
  • May be required for certain achievements or recognition

Related Pages

  • Spider Queen - The boss that must be defeated
  • Boss - General information about boss fights
  • Boss Badges - Other boss-related badges
  • Badges - General information about badges and achievements
